Description: Pavement Design Drawing Set - CAD drafting (paving layout plans sections details line marking plans)
Pavement Technical Specification - specification writing (asphalt concrete base line marking QC specs)
Pavement Design Calculations - layer thickness design load analysis structural capacity verification
Pavement QA/QC Records Compilation - test records documentation acceptance records
Asphalt Concrete Supply - dense-graded HMA for wearing/binder/base courses (~35000 m² × 150mm avg)
Asphalt Paving Installation - place and compact wearing/binder/base courses (~35000 m²)
Concrete Paving Materials - PCC for heavy load areas (~10000 m² × 200mm)
Concrete Paving Installation - place finish cure joint sawing (~10000 m²)
Granular Base Course Material - crushed aggregate base (~45000 m² × 200mm)
Base Course Placement and Compaction (~45000 m²)
Curb and Gutter Materials - precast or cast-in-place concrete (~2500 lm)
Curb and Gutter Installation - forming placing finishing (~2500 lm)
Sidewalk Materials - concrete (~600 m² × 100mm)
Sidewalk Installation - form place finish cure (~600 m²)
Line Marking Materials - thermoplastic and paint (~6000 lm)
Line Marking Application - traffic control safety markings parking stalls (~6000 lm)
Subgrade Fine Grading - final grade preparation before base course (~45000 m²)
Tack Coat and Prime Coat Materials (~35000 m²)
Tack Coat and Prime Coat Application (~35000 m²)
Compaction Testing - nuclear density tests during paving (~90 tests)
Core Sampling and Testing - thickness verification (~25 cores)
Survey and Grade Control - layout staking grade verification
Expansion Joints and Sealants - pavement joints at structures and Phase 2 tie-ins
Expansion Joint Installation - sawcutting sealing at structures (~500 lm)
OBJ-8 Phase 2 Tie-in Provisions - enhanced documentation and joint protection
Construction Indirects - field supervision site overhead QA/QC (factor-based)
EPCM / Project Management - PKG-04 allocation (factor-based)
Procurement Services - vendor coordination expediting (factor-based)
Testing and Verification - final verification testing reporting
